item.title: 去中心化社交應用 Bluesky 全面開放用戶註冊
item.description:
軟餐獲悉，去中心化的社交媒體應用程序 Bluesky 全面開放了用戶註冊（Play 商店）。現在任何人無需邀請即可註冊賬號。在開放註冊之前，該應用增強了其基礎設施和內容審核能力。Bluesky 於 2023 年 3 月推出，一直以來採用邀請制模式，此前超過 300 萬註冊了該應用。Bluesky 官方還宣佈，未來幾周或幾個月將推出一些新功能，包括：為想要進一步審核其 Feed 的用戶提供標籤服務、允許開發者和其他組織使用自己的審核規則創建自己的 Bluesky 服務器、提供類似於 X 的收費額外功能等。

The decentralized social media application Bluesky has opened up user registration to the public. Now anyone can sign up for an account without needing an invitation. Prior to opening up registration, the app enhanced its infrastructure and content moderation capabilities. Launched in March 2023, Bluesky had been operating on an invitation-only basis and attracted over 3 million registrations. Bluesky’s official announcement also revealed that new features will be rolled out in the coming weeks or months, including labeling services for users who want to further moderate their feed, allowing developers and other organizations to create their own Bluesky servers with their own moderation rules, and offering additional paid features similar to X.

item.title: Z-Library 現在可以高效地推薦圖書
item.description:
電子書網站 Z-Library 週一宣佈改進了其圖書推薦系統。新的系統可幫助讀者找到真正符合您興趣的圖書。Z-Library 介紹説，以前，其圖書推薦僅基於用戶行為，但這種方法存在侷限，例如它無法為稀有或不受歡迎的圖書生成推薦。為此該網站開發了自己的技術，可以在數百萬本圖書中找到相似的文本，並將其應用於推薦模塊中。現在，在生成推薦時，除了考慮用戶行為，還會用到其獨特的文本比較技術。這意味着在選擇推薦圖書時，Z-Library 會分析圖書內容，以提供更準確、多樣化的建議。

Z-Library 同時再次提醒避免訪問兩個仿冒網站，分別是 z-lib[.] io 和 z-lib[.] id。

The e-book website Z-Library announced on Monday that it has improved its book recommendation system. The new system is designed to help readers find books that truly match their interests. According to Z-Library, the previous book recommendations were solely based on user behavior, but this approach had limitations, such as the inability to generate recommendations for rare or unpopular books. To address this, the website developed its own technology to find similar texts among millions of books and implemented it in the recommendation module. Now, when generating recommendations, Z-Library takes into account not only user behavior but also its unique text comparison technology. This means that when selecting recommended books, Z-Library analyzes the content of the books to provide more accurate and diverse suggestions.

Z-Library also reminds users to avoid accessing two fraudulent websites, namely z-lib[.] io and z-lib[.] id.

item.title: 胡錫進談炒股賠錢：「如果時間可以倒流，我怎麼會投呢？」
item.description: 2 月 5 日，胡錫進做客京東金融直播間，分享 「老胡投資這一年」。截至 2 月 5 日收盤，胡錫進總浮虧 78025.6 元，今日浮虧 347 元。直播中，胡錫進笑稱，「如果時間可以倒流，帶着今天的思路和見識回到 3140 點，我怎麼會投呢？」胡錫進稱，炒股一是為了通過股市瞭解中國經濟，做參與者而不是旁觀者。二是開發自己的能力，如果能賺錢，炒股賺錢就不用寫稿了。他坦言，「沒有能力做投資建議，別模仿老胡，我只是按照我的邏輯、見識去炒股。」 而此前胡錫進曾表示 「2800 點以下遍地是黃金」 如何看待，他表示對於這個問題保持沉默。目前到底是什麼情況，需要時間驗證，而截至目前加倉的 12 萬元，基本是平的。

item.title: 德國高速鐵路還在用古老的 Windows 3.11
item.description:
軟餐獲悉，由西門子交通發佈的一則招聘廣告（已刪除）顯示，其客戶德國鐵路公司（DB）內部仍在使用已有 30 年曆史的 Windows for Workgroups 3.11 系統。該系統發佈於 1992 年 10 月。西門子正為德國鐵路尋找一位瞭解傳統操作系統的系統管理員，尤其是 Windows 3.11 for Workgroups。其職責是處理該系統的更新和維護。這則招聘信息還顯示，列車駕駛室的顯示系統基於 Windows 3.11 for Workgroups 運行，該系統實時向駕駛員顯示所有重要的技術數據。據悉，該系統最有可能用於舊的 ICE 1 和 ICE2 高速城際快車。西門子交通證實了招聘信息的真實性，並解釋説火車和鐵路基礎設施的使用壽命為 30 年或更長時間。該公司向公眾保證，其客戶 「繼續安全地使用業內久經考驗的遺留系統」，並且西門子為整個生命週期提供支持和維護。該公司還補充説，更新的系統是使用當前可用的軟件產品開發的，甚至會用到人工智能。

A recruitment advertisement (now deleted) released by Siemens Mobility has revealed that their client, Deutsche Bahn (DB), is still using the 30-year-old Windows for Workgroups 3.11 system internally. This system was released in October 1992. Siemens is actively seeking a system administrator with knowledge of traditional operating systems, particularly Windows 3.11 for Workgroups, to handle updates and maintenance of this system for Deutsche Bahn. The job description also states that the display systems in train cabins run on Windows 3.11 for Workgroups, providing real-time display of all critical technical data to the train drivers. It is reported that this system is most likely used for the older ICE 1 and ICE 2 high-speed intercity trains. Siemens Mobility has confirmed the authenticity of the recruitment information, explaining that the lifespan of trains and railway infrastructure is typically 30 years or longer. The company assures the public that their clients continue to use industry-proven legacy systems safely, and Siemens provides support and maintenance throughout the entire lifecycle. The company also adds that the updated systems are developed using currently available software products and may even incorporate artificial intelligence.

item.title: 高通公開提及下一代 Windows 系統：2024 年中發佈
item.description:
高通最近提到了下一代 Windows。該公司總裁兼首席執行官 Cristiano Renno Amon 在 2024 年第一季度財報電話會議上説「 下一版本的微軟 Windows」 將於 2024 年中期發佈。高通在一個不同於 Windows 11 的未定義的」Windows 操作系統」 上測試了其驍龍 X Elite 芯片組。他沒有明確提及它是否 Windows 12，但他透露該系統具備 「大量 Windows AI 功能」。

Qualcomm recently mentioned the next generation of Windows. Cristiano Renno Amon, the President and CEO of the company, stated during Qualcomm’s Q1 2024 earnings call that the 「next version of Microsoft Windows」 will be released in mid-2024. Qualcomm tested its Snapdragon X Elite chipset on an 「Windows operating system」 different from Windows 11. Although he did not specifically mention whether it is Windows 12, he revealed that the system possesses 「a lot of Windows AI capabilities.」
